column2: "Afei aber a Juda na Benjamin hɔn atamfo no tsee dɛ ndɔmmumkɔ mu mba no risi asɔrdan ama EWURADZE
column8: Wɔmma yɛnye hom nsi: osiandɛ yɛsɔr hom Nyankopɔn no
column9: dɛ mbrɛ hom yɛ yi; na ɔno na yɛbɔ no afɔr ofitsi Asiriahen Esar-haddon a ɔdze hɛn baa ha no ne nda no mu."

column2: "Na Zerubabel
column4: na Israel egyanom efiefi etsitsir nkaa no see hɔn dɛ
column5: Hom nnyi hweeara nye hɛn yɛ dɛ hom nye hɛn besi dan ama hɛn Nyankopɔn; na hɛnara nko bɔbɔ mu esi ama EWURADZE
column7: dɛ mbrɛ Persiahen Sirus ahyɛ hɛn no."

column2: "Nna asaase no do nkorɔfo no
column4: na wotuu hɔn akoma wɔ adansi no mu
column8: wɔ Persiahen Sirus ne nda no nyinara mu araa dze kodu Persiahen Darius n’ahendzi no mu."

column2: "Na Ahasuerus n’ahendzi no mu
column4: nna wɔkyerɛɛw ntoatoa nwoma dze tsiaa Juda na Jerusalɛm mba no."

column2: "Na Artasɛkeses ne nda no mu na Bishlam
column5: na ne nsɛfo nkaa no kyerɛɛw Persiahen Artasɛkeses; na nwoma no wɔkyerɛɛw no wɔ Siria kyerɛwee mu
column6: na wɔkyerɛɛ ase so wɔ Siria kasa mu."

column2: "Eguasosɛmpanyin Rehum na ɔkyerɛwfo Simsai kyerɛɛw nwoma no tsiaa Jerusalɛm dze kɛmaa ɔhen Artasɛkeses dɛm dɛ:"
"nna eguasosɛmpanyin Rehum
column4: na hɔn mfɛfo nkaa no; atsɛmbuafo
column10: Susafo a hɔnara so nye Elamfo
column12: "na amanaman nkaa a Ɔsenapar kɛse a ɔwɔ dzin no dze hɔn bae
column13: na ɔdze hɔn boguu Samaria kurow mu
column14: na aman nkaa a wɔwɔ esuegya noho no mu no

column2: "Nwoma a wɔdze somae ma wɔdze kɛmaa ɔhen Artasɛkeses no no nsusudo nye yi; Wo nkowaa mbarimba a wɔwɔ esuegya noho no
"Wɔmma ɔhen nhu
column3: dɛ Jewfo a wofi wo nkyɛn bae no wɔaba hɛn nkyɛn wɔ Jerusalɛm; wɔrekyekyer etuatsew kurow bɔn no

column2: "Afei wɔmma ɔhen nhu
column4: na wowie ho afasu no a
column8: na no nsunsuando bɛyɛ na ahemfo hɔn adze abɔ hɔn."

column2: "Afei osiandɛ ahemfie nkyen na yedzi
column3: na ɔnnsɛ hɛn dɛ yɛtsena ho hwɛ ɔhen n’adapaabɔ no ntsi
column4: na yɛasoma dɛ wɔmbɛda no edzi nkyerɛ ɔhen:"

column2: "ma wɔnhwehwɛ w’egyanom nkaa nwoma no mu: na ibohu no wɔ nkaa nwoma no mu
column3: na ehu dɛ kurow yi yɛ etuatsew kurow
column4: na obusufo dze ma ahemfo na amansin
column5: na wɔatwe manso wɔ ɔnoara mu fi tsetseberdo: iyi ntsi na wɔbɔɔ kurow no."

column2: "Hɛn dze
column3: yɛreda no edzi akyerɛ ɔhen dɛ
column5: na wowie ho afasu no a
column6: ɔno irinnya kyɛfa biara wɔ esuegya noho."

column2: "Nna ɔhen no somae ma wɔdze mbuae kɛmaa eguasosɛmpanyin Rehum
column4: na hɔn mfɛfo nkaa no a wɔtsetse Samaria
column5: na aman nkaa a wɔwɔ esuegya noho no mu no dɛ

column2: "Nwoma no a hom somae ma wɔdze brɛɛ hɛn no wɔakenkan no kofee wɔ m’enyim."
"Na emi so mehyɛe
column4: na woehu dɛ kurow yi fi tsetseberdo na ɔmaa noho tsiaa ahemfo
column5: na etuatsew na mansotwe sisii mu."

column2: "Ahemfo akatakyi so na wɔahwɛ Jerusalɛm do
column3: hɔn na wɔhwɛɛ aman a ɔwɔ esuegya noho nyinara do; na ɔtow
column5: na kwandodze so wotuae maa hɔn."

column2: "Afei hom nhyɛ mbra mma mbarimba no ngyaa
column3: na amma wɔannkyekyer kurow yi ma onkodu dɛ mara mebɛhyɛ ho mbra ana."

column2: "Na hom nhwɛ yie ma hom aannyɛ nyaanyaa wɔ mu: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ɔsɛɛ botu mpon ma ahemfo adze abɔ hɔn?"
"Afei aber a ɔhen Artasɛkeses no nwoma no no nsusudo no wɔkenkaan no wɔ Rehum
column4: na hɔn mfɛfo no enyim ara pɛr
column5: nna wosii mu ntsɛmara baa Jerusalɛm Jewfo no nkyɛn
column6: na wɔdze nhyɛ na tum siiw hɔn kwan."

column2: "Nna wogyaa Nyankopɔn ne fi no a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no no ho edwuma no yɛ; na ɔkwan siwii araa dze kodur Persiahen Darius n’ahendzi mu afe a otsia ebien no mu."
